entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
